content: is there such a thing as  Pulsarhunters.org?

As an AI language model, I don't have real-time information on the existence of specific websites at any given moment. However, as of my last update in October 2021, there is indeed a website called Pulsar Hunters (pulsarhunters.org). According to their website, Pulsar Hunters is a citizen science project that involves members of the public in the search for pulsars through data analysis of radio signals.
